verbs.description: Ed Markey , Joe Kennedy , and Katherine Clark [V: are] calling out President Donald Trump 's top homeland security official for her defense of the administration 's practice of separating immigrant children from their families .

[ARG0: Ed Markey , Joe Kennedy , and Katherine Clark] are [V: calling] out [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's top homeland security official] [ARGM-PNC: for her defense of the administration 's practice of separating immigrant children from their families] .

Ed Markey , Joe Kennedy , and Katherine Clark are calling out President Donald Trump 's top homeland security official for her defense of the administration 's practice of [V: separating] [ARG1: immigrant children] [ARG2: from their families] .
